job_title: Human Resources Associate in London, England
pros: I worked at Gain in London for eight months and during my time I met an incredible group of motivated and passionate people where there was a real sense of camaraderie. People are willing to help each other, there's full support among colleagues and your ideas are listened to and appreciated. Pay also not bad and some good benefits including generous holiday allowance.
cons: The senior management need a revamp - think they're far removed from the staff and there's a disconnect between decisions that are made and those who are most affected. No one feels involved in decision making which leads to some frustration. Lack of progression but this was for me specifically, just because of our structure I wasn't able to take on as much responsibility as I would have liked, although my manager was extremely supportive of me.
